name: HumanZoo
description:
This is a reverse world, animals are stronger than human, so animals go to zoo to see human.

You play as a human who has to please the animals with your dance skill.

You will get good reward(food) if you please lots of animals, otherwise you gain nothing.

Try to survive!

Controls:

Press Esc to open menu to restart , tips and quit.

Press Q to dance, all the animals in front of you(with a fan-shape area) will be please by you.
